title: Sri Lankan Blue Sapphire - 1 Carat
description: This exquisite 1 carat Blue Sapphire gemstone from Sri Lanka is renowned for its deep blue color and exceptional clarity. Sourced from the finest mines, this gemstone embodies wisdom, virtue, and good fortune. The sapphire is expertly cut to enhance its natural brilliance and is polished to a high luster. Its vibrant blue hue and pristine clarity make it an ideal choice for various jewelry pieces, from rings to necklaces. This Blue Sapphire's timeless beauty and elegance ensure it will be cherished for generations, making it a valuable addition to any gemstone collection.
meta_title: Sri Lankan Blue Sapphire - 1 Carat | Luminous Gems
meta_description: Discover the exquisite 1 carat Blue Sapphire gemstone, sourced from Sri Lanka. Perfect for various jewelry pieces with its deep blue color and high clarity.

title: Sri Lankan Blue Sapphire - 2 Carat

Mined from the finest sources, this gemstone symbolizes wisdom, virtue, and good fortune. The sapphire is meticulously cut to maximize its brilliance and is polished to reveal its stunning depth of color. Ideal for creating luxurious jewelry pieces, this Blue Sapphire is a timeless treasure. Its vibrant hue and pristine clarity make it a perfect gift for any occasion, adding a touch of elegance and sophistication to any collection.
meta_title: Sri Lankan Blue Sapphire - 2 Carat | Luminous Gems
